Sample Dictionary

A small sample dictionary that acts as an example of the dictionary format.

Group by first letter

  • C

    • cat

  • D

    • dog

  • M

    • mouse

Group by tag

  • animal

    • cat1
    • dog1
    • mouse1

  • carnivore

    • cat1

  • commands

    • cat2

  • mammal

    • cat1
    • dog1
    • mouse1

  • omnivore

    • dog1
    • mouse1

  • periphreal

    • mouse2

  • unix

    • cat2
